= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *VCA.FT.V1* || Primary Visual Cortex || Neocortex BA-17 || Detect color, shape and movements || Striate Cortex, phyletic memory ||
|| *VCA.FT.V2* || Secondary Visual Cortex || Neocortex BA-18 || Storage of Object Recognition Memory || Prestriate Cortex ||
|| *VCA.FT.V3* || Associative Visual Cortex || Neocortex BA-19 || Processing of global motion, dynamic shapes || Dorsal Extrastriate Cortex ||
|| *VCA.FT.V4* || Fusiform Gyrus || Neocortex BA-37 || Recognizing shapes and colors || Ventral stream ||
|| *VCA.FT.MT* || Middle Temporal Area || Neocortex BA-19 || Integration of local motion signals into global percepts || V5, Ventro-dorsal stream ||
|| *VCA.FT.PO* || Parietooccipital Area || Neocortex BA-19 || Analyzing self-motion relative to the environment || V6, DM, Dorsomedial Area, Dorsal stream ||
|| *VCA.FT.IT.TEO* || Preoccipital Inferotemporal Area || Neocortex BA-21 || Represent different features of objects || Part of IT Cortex ||
|| *VCA.FT.IT.TE* || Inferotemporal Area || Neocortex BA-20 || Represent different views of objects || Part of IT Cortex ||
